text: Ek roz baadshah ne kaha “ maine khwab mein dekha hai ke saat (seven) moti gaayein (cows) jinko saat (seven) dubli (lean) gaayein kha rahi hain, aur anaaj ke saat baalein hari (green) hain aur dursi saat sukhi. Aey ehle darbar , mujhey is khwab ki tabeer batao agar tum khwabon ka matlab samajhte ho.”
